chapters.title: Chapter 11: Just Before Dawn
chapters.info: Leane Sharif, p. 158—Willowy, copper-skinned Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah from Arad Doman. She is as tall as most men, and fairly young—too young to have achieved the ageless look. One of Moiraine's friends as an Accepted, she quickly became her friend again after giving her her shawl and welcoming her to the Blue Ajah.
